title.rendered: How to Increase Conversion Rate on Shopify, Woocommerce, Magento, Bigcommerce with Claus Lauter,  Ecommerce Growth Marketing Specialist

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:12 — 25.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:12 — 25.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Clause Lauter started with own startup in 2001 with a SaaS service, then got an offer in cape town in SA.

Today Claus will talk about how optimization work is wonderful and that you work once and get paid for a long time. So it’s really fantastic from the cash flow perspective and sort of getting wins. Listen in to learn more.

 

Get a free 10-minute mini-site conversion optimization review here.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The classic mistakes online store owners make
  • The Psychological Principles of CRO
  • The other rules of thumb about UI/UX
  • How tools like Hotjar, lucky orange help you with conversions
  • How not to give discount codes in exchange for emails
